title: OnePlus Shelf adds Spotify integration in latest update
content:
OnePlus Shelf is the customizable home screen panel available on many OnePlus phones (when you’re not using the Google Feed), with various widgets and shortcuts to give you quick access to important functions. Now another feature is coming to the Shelf: Spotify integration. OnePlus product engineer Kireeti Varma revealed in a forum post, “we are

The post OnePlus Shelf adds Spotify integration in latest update appeared first on xda-developers.
description: OnePlus Shelf has a new optional card for Spotify, which shows what you're currently listening to and other recently-played content.
